main event: A yard-colored light flashed across the sky leaving a long trail, observed at Tyndall AFB.
interesting points: The sighting was made using ground radar and visual air observations., The observation lasted for only 4 seconds., The light was described as yard-colored., Multiple sources reported the sighting from various locations in and around Tyndall AFB., The incident occurred during the early morning hours.
witness description: Reported from various sources in and around Tyndall.
